EmailTemplate.name: TSS_UserConference_Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Survey: Tell us your TriCON experience and be entered to win $250
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tell us what you think September 13 - 16 l Boston, Massachusetts
Thank you for joining us at TriCON 2011 in Boston, Massachusetts. In order to develop a valuable program, please complete our TriCON 2011 survey. We strongly value your feedback and strive to make TriCON as informative and enjoyable as possible.
Click here to complete our TriCON 2011 Attendee Survey Link to copy and paste: http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/TriCON2011
Attendees who complete the survey will be entered to win a $250 Gift Card to a store of your choice. Additionally, upon completion of your survey, you will receive instructions on how to access and download copies of the TriCON 2011 presentations.
All of us at TriTech Software Systems thank you for your continued participation in this important event, and we look forward to seeing you next year at TriCON 2012 in San Diego.
Regards, Jenny V. Clavero Associate Marketing Manager TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com
Direct: 858.799.7362 | jenny.clavero@tritech.com
Save the Date and Budget for TriCON 2012
Dates: Wednesday, September 26 - Friday, September 28
Location: Hilton San Diego Bayfront
Discounted hotel rate: $199/night
Support: Contact Jenny or Accounting to add TriCON registration to your support agreement.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
